document.discussion_title: Breguet 8400BB Ladies' Marine, White Gold & Diamonds for sale $14,700
document.topic_text: Condition: pre-owned, in mint condition. Box and papers: no box or papers. Reference: 8400BB Movement: mechanical with automatic winding; Breguet Caliber 552; 21 jewels; 21,600 vph; power reserve approx. 42 hours; fine-tuned by hand. Functions: hours, minutes, sweep seconds; date. Case: 18 karat white gold; 32.5 x 7.4 mm (excl. lugs & crown); bezel and lugs with high-quality factory-set diamonds; sapphire crystal; white gold domed crown; case back secured by 6 screws. Water-resistant to 30 meters. Dial: white mother-of-pearl, with guilloche' center; printed Roman numerals; 11 small diamond hour markers; blued-steel Breguet hands. Indications: date at 3. Bracelet: 18 karat white gold, with white gold double-deployant clasp. FeelGoodWatches.com is not an authorized dealer for the brands offered, and we cannot advertise the watches we sell as new. The watches we sell are used, but some of them are unworn. There is no manufacturer’s warranty on this watch. We trust these timepieces to be of such high caliber that we warrant all watches we sell for a period of 1 year. You may also be interested in these watches from FeelGoodWatches, Inc.
